casebody.data:
BARHAM
v.
HAWK, et al. No. 461PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 2, 2005. Kathleen K. Lucchesi, Charlotte, for Defendant-Appellant. Robert O. Jenkins, Raleigh, E. Hardy Lewis, for Barham.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of April 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Hawk & Ear, Nose & Throat) shall have up to and including the 9th day of June 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of May 2005."
